did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Faculty Meeting Minutes Collection

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: An artificial collection of meeting minutes of various faculty groups.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains meeting minutes created by various faculty groups at the University of Connecticut dating from 1920 through 1997.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut, Faculty Meeting Minutes Collection. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Provenance and Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The minutes have been transferred to the Archives by departments and individuals over time.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Copyright Information
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: An artificial collection of minutes of a variety of faculty department, groups and associations.

did.unittitle: College of Agriculture and Natural Resources, College of Liberal Arts and Sciences,
Committee on Graduate Students, Committee on a Nuclear Reactor Center, Committee on Scholastic Standing, Council of Deans, Daily Campus,
Finance Committee, FSSO, Graduate Student Council, Hartford College of Law,

School of Pharmacy, School of Physical Education, Student Life Committee, SUBOG,
